steps.title: Discovery & Research
steps.description: We begin by deeply understanding your business, users, and objectives. We analyze your brand and positioning, study target users and create detailed personas. A competitive benchmark and market analysis allow us to define success objectives and metrics. We then map user journeys, identify functional needs and technical constraints, and define the creative direction that will guide the entire project.

steps.title: Architecture & Wireframing
steps.description: We structure information and design the first interface schemas. This phase includes optimized information architecture, prioritization of content and functionalities, and creation of wireframes for key screens. We define user paths and flows, validate concepts with stakeholders, and iterate based on initial feedback. This rigorous preparation ensures a smooth transition to the visual design phase.

steps.title: UI Design & Visual Exploration
steps.description: We transform wireframes into visually attractive interfaces. This creative phase begins with the creation of moodboards and visual directions, followed by interface design for main screens. We define typography, colors, and components, create custom graphic elements, and adapt the design responsively for all devices. Multiple iterations allow us to refine the design until the final client presentation and validation.

steps.title: Prototyping & Testing
steps.description: We validate concepts through interactive prototypes that simulate main interactions. User testing on these prototypes allows us to analyze real feedback and behaviors. The insights gathered guide necessary adjustments to refine the user experience. This crucial step also includes detailed documentation of interactions to facilitate development, ensuring that the final product perfectly meets expectations.

steps.title: Finalization & Handoff
steps.description: We prepare all assets for perfect implementation. This final phase includes finalization of all screens and states, creation of components and variants, and documentation of interactions and animations. We prepare development assets with detailed technical specifications and a comprehensive implementation guide for developers. Our team also provides ongoing support during the development phase to ensure perfect fidelity to the design.

cost.question: What is the cost of a web or mobile design project?
cost.answer: The cost entirely depends on the scope of your project. Our design services can range from a few hundred euros for a partial redesign, up to 10,000 euros or more for a complete platform or complex application design. During our first meeting, we precisely analyze your needs to offer you a personalized and transparent quote.

timeline.question: How long does it take to complete a design project?
timeline.answer: Timelines vary depending on the complexity of your project. A simple design can be completed in 2-3 weeks, while a complete redesign or complex application may require several months. However, our iterative approach allows you to quickly visualize the first creative directions and progressively refine the design.

collaboration.question: How does collaboration with your design team work?
collaboration.answer: After an initial briefing to understand your objectives, we establish a transparent collaboration process with clearly defined validation stages. You have access to our collaborative design tools to track progress and provide real-time feedback. Regular meetings allow us to validate each phase and adjust the direction if necessary. Our goal is to create a smooth partnership where your vision and our expertise combine for optimal results.

deliverables.question: What deliverables will I receive at the end of the project?
deliverables.answer: Our standard deliverables include source design files (Figma, XD, Sketch), graphic assets optimized for development, documentation of interactions and animations, a style guide or design system, and technical specifications for developers. For more complex projects, we also provide interactive prototypes, detailed implementation guides, and support during the development phase.

development.question: How do you ensure the design will be easy to develop?
development.answer: Our design team works closely with developers to ensure our creations are technically feasible and optimized for implementation. We use practices like modular design, design systems, and detailed technical documentation. Our designers understand technical constraints and create interfaces that combine aesthetics and feasibility, reducing gaps between design and development.

accessibility.question: How do you approach accessibility in your designs?
accessibility.answer: Accessibility is integrated from the beginning of our design process. We follow WCAG standards and test our interfaces with various accessibility tools. We pay particular attention to color contrasts, keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, and text alternatives. Our goal is to create inclusive designs that work for all users, regardless of their abilities, without compromising aesthetics or overall experience.

implementation.question: Do you also handle the development of your designs?
implementation.answer: Absolutely! Our expertise extends from design to development, allowing us to ensure faithful implementation of your mockups. Our design and development teams work in synergy to ensure that every pixel and interaction is perfectly reproduced. If you already have a development team, we provide all necessary assets and documentation, and can provide follow-up during implementation to ensure the quality of the final result.

success.question: How do you measure the success of a design?
success.answer: We define with you success metrics aligned with your business objectives: conversion rate, user engagement, bounce rate, user satisfaction, etc. After launch, we analyze this data to evaluate the design's impact and identify optimization opportunities. Our data-driven approach allows us to continuously evolve the design to maximize its performance, combining aesthetics and measurable effectiveness.
